articles.description: The government's revised regional tiers are now in force. Here's what they mean for pubs and restaurants
articles.content:
What about pubs outside of England? 
Different rules apply to the other nations of the United Kingdom.
Scotland operates under a five-level system of local restrictions. In the highest level, 4, no… [+2813 chars]
